title: [UPDATE 1] OCE 1v1 Tournament! 11th of January, OPEN TO ALL!
body:
Hey All!

Thanks to everyone who has registered for the 1v1 tournament on January the 11th! Currently we have **38 entries** and I have increased the max entries from **32 to 64**!

This is going to be a massive day!

Some people have pointed out that I missed a rule on how you can win our 1v1 games, so here are the 3 ways.
1.  Achieving first blood the opponent
2.  Destroying your opponents FIRST middle turret
3.  Getting to 100 CS first

Any of these will result in a win for you and moving onto the next round.

*YOU MUST REGISTER YOUR IGN HERE TO BE ENTERED IN THE TOURNAMENT - http://binarybeast.com/xLoL1412150*
___________________________________________________________________________________
ORIGINAL THREAD
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/nj4F1mhh-oce-1v1-tournament-11th-of-january-open-to-all
